short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for replacing trigger words and blurring triggering images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin allows you to define trigger words and de-trigger words, words that will replace the triggering word. It also allows you to configure your trigger to blur images (to some degree of accuracy).
